text: Pascal Lainé (10 May 1942 – 30 December 2024) was a French academic and writer. He wrote over 20 novels. He was born in Anet, Eure-et-Loir, France. He won the Prix Médicis in 1971 for l'Irrévolution and the Goncourt in 1974 for La Dentellière. He also taught at the Lycée Louis-le-Grand in Paris. Lainé died on 30 December 2024 in Paris at the age of 82.Mort de l'écrivain Pascal Lainé, Goncourt 1974 pour « La dentellière » ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2024 deaths Category:French academics Category:French novelists Category:French essayists Category:People from Eure-et-Loir Category:Writers from Paris
title: Pascal Lainé
